OwnPortfolios.title: Flight-Booking
OwnPortfolios.description: Building an intuitive flight booking website with seamless booking, and responsive design for a smooth user experience.

OwnPortfolios.title: Food-Order Website
OwnPortfolios.description: Developed a Food-Order website that allows users to browse products, add items to the cart, and view the cart. The cart page displays the individual prices of products along with the total amount for all items in the cart.

OwnPortfolios.title: E-Commerce
OwnPortfolios.description: Developed an E-commerce website featuring product displays, accessible after user login. The platform provides a secure login system, allowing customers to view and purchase products once authenticated.

OwnPortfolios.title: API Products List
OwnPortfolios.description: Built an e-commerce product list page with API-based products, featuring filters (range, category), smooth scrolling, animations, and an Add to Cart button. Includes toast notifications on adding products to the cart.

OwnPortfolios.title: Info-Tech Website
OwnPortfolios.description: Developed a website for Innam Info Technologies to showcase its features, services, and portfolio, enabling efficient management of client projects.

OwnPortfolios.title: API Products List (Beginner)
OwnPortfolios.description: Create an API Products List using the Fetch API to dynamically retrieve and display product data. This approach ensures real-time updates and seamless integration with external APIs for a responsive product list.

OwnPortfolios.title: Currency-Converter
OwnPortfolios.description: Build a dynamic Currency Converter using React.js and a reliable API for real-time exchange rates. This React-based app ensures quick and accurate currency conversions with up-to-date data.

OwnPortfolios.title: Calculator
OwnPortfolios.description: Develop a Calculator project using JavaScript to perform basic arithmetic operations. This interactive calculator offers a user-friendly interface with responsive design for smooth calculations.

OwnPortfolios.title: Clock
OwnPortfolios.description: Build a real-time clock project using JavaScript to display the current time dynamically. This digital clock updates every second and features a sleek, responsive design.

OwnPortfolios.title: Todo-List
OwnPortfolios.description: Developed a Todo List application with features to add new tasks, update existing tasks, and delete tasks, with real-time status updates and persistent data storage for seamless task management.

OwnPortfolios.title: Newspaper Template
OwnPortfolios.description: Developed a newspaper template using HTML and CSS as a beginner project to showcase my strong skills in web layout and styling, demonstrating proficiency in both HTML structure and CSS design techniques.

OwnPortfolios.title: Form Validation
OwnPortfolios.description: Developed a user authentication project that includes both login and signup forms using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This beginner project allows users to register and access.

OwnPortfolios.title: Beginner LandingPage
OwnPortfolios.description: I have developed a beginner project using HTML and CSS with an appealing layout.

CompanyPortfolios.title: Hostel Website
CompanyPortfolios.description: Developed a website to display hostels with their locations and listed features. Users can book hostel rooms through the booking form provided. (Currently under development process)

CompanyPortfolios.title: Keyan Technologies
CompanyPortfolios.description: Developed a website for Keyan Technologies to showcase its features, services, and portfolio, enabling efficient management of client projects. (Currently under development process)

CompanyPortfolios.title: Hostel Dashboard
CompanyPortfolios.description: The Hostel Management Dashboard is a web-based application designed for administrators to manage room details, track availability, and oversee user bookings. (Only Admin can access)

CompanyPortfolios.title: Keyan Technologies Dashboard
CompanyPortfolios.description: The Keyan Technologies Dashboard is a dynamic admin panel that allows seamless management of website content (Only Admin can access)
